channel.title: CVE Feed for Trend Micro -- Deep Security Manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Trend Micro -- Deep Security Manager

item.title: CVE-2019-15626|2024-08-05T00:56:22.020Z -- trend%20micro -- deep%20security%20manager
item.description: The Deep Security Manager application (Versions 10.0, 11.0 and 12.0), when configured in a certain way, may transmit initial LDAP communication in clear text. This may result in confidentiality impact but does not impact integrity or availability.
